channel.title: Zezima
channel.description:
Guys, I found a video of what Zezima does when he's logged off or when runescape servers are updating.
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AJmLku_vT2E&feature=related]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AJmLku_vT2E&feature=related[/url]
It's the first thing that came to mind when I saw it lol.

item.title: Zezima
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

Your inferring i’m an ‘idiot low level player’ because i believe “MOST” top 50 accounts are not botted/sw’d/pc’d, etc?

That’s quite the assumption to make so earlier tbh, and i cannot succeed? i’d beg to differ, how ever, i won’t cry over pixels. I prefer not going past 125+ combat anyway, 110-120 is the way to stay tbh, but anyway.

And @ your first sentence, no i am not in the top 50, thus, it creates a fault in my statement, and makes my arguement pointless, as no evidence is shown that my statement can create a true outcome. But w.e believe what you want, i’m not going to fuss.

Read full topic

item.title: Zezima
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

the1337legend:

although most top 50 players Soulwar ALOT /have botted, garuntee it.

I’m sorry, but who are you again? And on what authority do you make such a brazen statement? Are you a top 50 player who has personally cheated, thus making your statement true for at least one player?

Having read an excerpt from the pmod forum when it was leaked a while back, I’m aware of the fact that the macro detection system is triggered only in the event that someone reports you as a potential botter.
However I’d be willing to bet that for the most competitive players the system is running around the clock, if for no other reason than the fact that idiot lower leveled players think the high level players must be macroing – after all, if they can’t succeed at something then nobody else will be able to either, right?

Let’s be reasonable. Even the best macroing software would be likely to slip up eventually if the account was placed under the microscope on a regular basis.
It’s one thing to get away with macroing on an account that can essentially fly under the radar, but a different story entirely when subject to scrutiny.

And yeah, I’ve heard of maxed combat accounts (or close to it) that have been botted, slowly and steadily (Semaphore mentioned winterlove at one stage, and I believe ollie has a 130+ account).
However getting 200m in skills takes an awfully long time, even with the most efficient experience acquisition methods.

Read full topic

item.title: Zezima
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

if your special like me, you have access to 6 different internet connections + 4 more (friends) that run off dif ips, just do the “someone else was on my account” if you get it the second time “i think theres a keylogger on my computer, i’ll try and remove it”, works well tbh. although most top 50 players Soulwar ALOT /have botted, garuntee it.

Read full topic

item.title: Zezima
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

You guys realise that they’re ranked so highly because of their proficiency at acquiring money more so than the hours they play, right?
Fletching, as an example, can get you 400 - 500k xp per hour – it’s expensive though.
The only reason gertjaars is doing so well is that he has the wherewithal to make money efficiently in the game.

Read full topic
